name: Junk Dip
author: Jenny
summary: I have been making this Mexican-inspired dip for years. It's similar to a dip seen in advertisements for processed American cheese, but with my own twists. It's great as an appetizer, but this hearty mixture of beef, cheese and refried beans can also be served as a full meal. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (2 ounce) can chopped black olives, drained
directions: Place ground beef in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Place processed American cheese and milk in a large, heavy saucepan over medium heat
Stirring frequently, cook until cheese is melted
One at a time, mix in ground beef, salsa, black olives and refried beans
Keep the mixture warm over low heat while serving
